title: Hello. Is this regular or did I just come across bad persons?
body:
I am level 16 summoner. I started playing a month ago I think.

The person on my team killed no minions, and just ran at the other team tower to die 39 times, (0/39/1, 0 cs)
This is troubling, and of course we lose, but more shockingly the person on the other team is yelling NO %%%%%%S NO %%%%%%S in the chat box to our team all game. This slur is his name as well.

Either scenerio seperately is not enjoyable. But together I must question if this is the general temperature of the persons that play this game. If so I will remove myself. Please do answer. I play many games, but I do not often see this level of grief on both sides of teams at once.

Another question is it took me long to reach level 16 summoner. Does a person with a name such as this not worry for wasting his own time should his account go? Or does no one enforce penalty so there is nothing to worry about? I am confused somewhat that this person seems brazen to name themselves such a slur or in the other case force a team loss with an intentional pointshave to 0/39/1. 

Strange.
